verses.verse: And it came to pass, when <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> had <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, and had <S%H2393>strengthened<s%> himself, he <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him.

And it came to pass, that in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H7895>Shishak<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, because they had <S%H4603>transgressed<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>,

With twelve <S%H3967%H505>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> were without <S%H4557>number<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> with him out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; the <S%H3864>Lubims<s%>, the <S%H5525>Sukkiims<s%>, and the <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%>.
And he <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4694>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> which pertained to <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%>, and to the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H7895>Shishak<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Ye have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and therefore have I <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> you in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7895>Shishak<s%>.
Whereupon the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3665>humbled<s%> themselves; and they <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.

And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they <S%H3665>humbled<s%> themselves, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, They have <S%H3665>humbled<s%> themselves; therefore I will not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> them, but I will <S%H5414>grant<s%> them <S%H4592>some<s%> <S%H6413>deliverance<s%>; and my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall not be poured <S%H5413>out<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7895>Shishak<s%>.
Nevertheless they shall be his <S%H5650>servants<s%>; that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H5656>service<s%>, and the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>countries<s%>.

So <S%H7895>Shishak<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and took <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>; he <S%H3947>took<s%> all: he carried <S%H3947>away<s%> also the <S%H4043>shields<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%>.

Instead of which <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4043>shields<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and <S%H6485>committed<s%> them to the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H7323>guard<s%>, that <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And <S%H1767>when<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H7323>guard<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5375>fetched<s%> them, and brought them <S%H7725>again<s%> into the <S%H7323>guard<s%> <S%H8372>chamber<s%>.

And when he <S%H3665>humbled<s%> himself, the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> from him, that he would not <S%H7843>destroy<s%> him <S%H3617>altogether<s%>: and also in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> went <S%H2896>well<s%>.

¶ So <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> himself in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H4427>reigned<s%>: for <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7651%H6240>seventeen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H977>chosen<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> there. And his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5279>Naamah<s%> an <S%H5985>Ammonitess<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, because he <S%H3559>prepared<s%> not his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Now the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%>, <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last<s%>, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H1697>book<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and of <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> the <S%H2374>seer<s%> concerning <S%H3187>genealogies<s%>? And there were <S%H4421>wars<s%> between <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H3117>continually<s%>.

And <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>: and <S%H29>Abijah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead.
